Marcos Antonio de Siqueira

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0763906057509836
  • Última atualização do currículo em 31/05/2015

Marcos A. Siqueira is currently a Systems Engineer at Padtec. He was born in Goias, Brazil, in 1978, and received the B.S. degree in Electrical Engineering in 1999 from UFG Federal University of Goias, the M.S. and Ph.D degrees in Electrical Engineering from the Faculty of Electrical and Computer Engineering, State University of Campinas Unicamp Brazil, in 2002 and 2015 respectively. His interests include Optical Transport Networks, IP/MPLS, SDN, Network Virtualization, Policy-based management, Network equipment design and others. Previously, he worked for CPqD Telecom R&D Center, as well as for Telefonica. Additionally, he had been Faculty member of Post-Graduation courses in Telecommunications in IBTA/Metrocamp and UNORP Universities. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Projetos de pesquisa
2002 - 2004
Next Generation Networks
Descrição: R&D for developing methodologiesfor design and implementation of IP networks prepared for NGN, considering QoS, Traffic Engineering, and others. An Optical UNI was developed to interface GMPLS OXC control plane with MPLS-TE control plane..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.
Alunos envolvidos: Graduação: (0) / Especialização: (0) / Mestrado acadêmico: (0) / Mestrado profissional: (0) / Doutorado: (0) .

Integrantes: Marcos Antonio de Siqueira - Integrante / Marta Duran Fernandez - Coordenador.

Número de produções C, T & A: 12
2000 - 2001
MPLS Neeworks
Descrição: R&D of mechanisms for Traffic Engineering and Networks Management in MPLS Networks..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.
Alunos envolvidos: Graduação: (0) / Especialização: (0) / Mestrado acadêmico: (7) / Mestrado profissional: (0) / Doutorado: (3) .
